comment.author: 38811045@N04
comment._content: SDGW notes born in Laggan, enlisted Glasgow. His number indicates he joined the HLI in September 1914.

comment.author: 63191264@N00
comment._content:
CWGC:
Grant Archibald
Private
Highland Light Infantry
“C” Coy. 15th Batallion
Age 23
Date of Death 3rd July 1916
Service No. 13179
Son of Annie Grant of 32 Innes Street, Inverness, and the late Andrew Grant.
Born 1893, the 1901 Census records him living with his parents Andrew [b.1852], Annie [b.1859] and his older brother Alexander [b.1889] and  younger sister Mar Ann [b.1896] in Dores, Inverness [on the edge of Loch Ness].
The CWGC entry records the family address as 32 Innes Street [the property still exists].
